segments.text: We're considering of ordering 200 computers , but I'm wondering about the price you'll possibly offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our price will be not less than $ 5000 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your price is higher than I expected . Could you give us a little discount ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is already our best price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the price is always negotiable and you should consider our quantity of order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid that there is no room to negotiate the price . This is the best price we can quote .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can we meet each other half way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's close the deal at $ 4800 , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You drive a hard bargain ! OK , that's a deal .
segments.speaker: S2
